If anyone is looking for a Junior Android position and wants to work with one of the leading companies in the tech and innovation space ;): <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/154378856>
If anyone is looking for a Senior Android position and wants to work with one of the leading companies in the tech and innovation space ;): <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/157120993>
Please be sure to read the description in it’s entirety
<@U1HBECGBX>: Please post a full job description. This includes: level, remote, location, etc.
<@U08GFT5V5>: :taco:
<@U08GFT5V5>: the LinkedIn has a full job description btw
<@U08GFT5V5>: don’t want to repost, but as <@U061HDV96> noted, the full description can be found via the link.
Some people bear an inordinate amount of hate towards linkedin
in the professional software development world, to not be too blunt, they have to get over it XD (even cringing at the Microsoft purchase)
Sort of like hating Microsoft Lync or Outlook and expecting it to not be in large businesses….
<@U1HBECGBX>: but you have to admit that all of that software just plain sucks.
there is a real need for a linkedin replacement
unfortunately xing doesn’t seem to spread outside of germany
-_- I don’t disagree with any of the comments above (using Slack internally bypassing Lync/Skype for a reason)
and if you’ve ever used Outlook on OSX…...
luckily you can sync mail and calendar to your outlook account. just wish they actually came out with the skype business for mac client already
<@U1E65QLQ0|jhight> has joined the channel
yeaaah their calendar is so buggy on Android
like…. unusable buggy, or at least was 2 weeks ago.
I only use outlook of their products anymore

Hello, everyone!

MartianCraft is looking for a senior level Android developer. MartianCraft is a software design and development agency working with some of the most well known and respected brands on Earth, such as IBM, Fox, Apple, and many others. We offer both contract and full time positions. All positions are remote, telecommute, and flextime. Comfortable work atmosphere that is results driven. Benefits such as gym membership, unlimited time off, and company sponsored events. Full time positions provide 401(k), top of line healthcare for you and your entire family, vision with LASIK coverage, and dental. Competitive pay and benefits. MartianCraft is an equal opportunity employer.

Ideal candidates would have 5+ years of software development experience, with 3+ years of native Android development and have published at least three original Android apps. You should have plenty of experience working with remote data via REST and JSON, and have valuable experience with third-party libraries and APIs. Other things that are nice to have (but not required) include previous remote work experience and published books or conference talks.

As mentioned before, we are 100% telecommute and have employees in both the US and EU. If this sounds interesting, please email me directly -- <mailto:josh@martiancraft.com|josh@martiancraft.com> -- with your resume.
happy to answer any questions here, too
